name: Starter Form
description: A Simple 1 field form to get started with

name: Contact Form
description: Illustrating the use of the combined 'name' & 'nladdress' fields.

name: Wizard
description: A Simple multi-page form that shows how you can build wizards

name: Survey
description: A TypeForm-like survey, with one element at a time shown to the user

name: MultiInput Test
description: An example of the use of the multiinput control to collect related data

name: ListView Example
description: An example of the use of the ListView control to display and manage complex data

name: TreeView Example
description: An example of the use of the TreeView control to display hierarchical data

name: Complex Form with conditional logic
description: A multi-page form with interdepedencies, using the ExoForm Rules engine

name: Model Binding
description: A form that shows how to use model binding

name: Advanced: custom control states
description: A complete example of Model Data Binding combined with JS logic and custom navigation controls bound to state in the model.

name: Leaflet GEO map with data binding
description: An example showing an OpenStreetMap map using the Leafle-powered map control, with databinding to a model and JSON Schema

name: Textbox with countries autocomplete
description: An example showing a textbox with autocompletion using search on a REST API
